short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Course/professor rating to help with SCU schedule planning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily view professor and course ratings through additions to the course registration website, as well as a custom searching tool. Consider these rankings with the courses your friends have taken, or are interested in.
